Articles.Content:
Download

This is a set of parts inspired by the original KSP parts. The parts in this pack include 3 engines, 2 tanks, and the Mk1 command pod. Each part is more or less the same as their counterparts in the current version. Please note I had to scale them up to 2m, as there's no way 3 kerbals are going to fit in a 1m pod.

Here's what the parts look like in-game:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

You may not redistribute this mod or parts of it without my permission.

Edited January 31, 2015 by StarVision
Awesome, looks great!
It lives again!
I haven't been playing for long enough to remember this pod, but it looks awesome. Especially the IVA. Nice Job on that!
Yes. Please. Can you make the fuselage too?
Beautiful

Yes. Please. Can you make the fuselage too?

Do you mean the old fuel tank? If so, then sure. I had already planned on doing that at some point.
Awesome! I look forward to dling it when I get home.
This brings back memories.

Fantastic! KSP has always been missing a Gemini-analog and I'm thrilled to have one now. Can't wait to fly this baby!

Even the cockpit is exactly as I hoped it'd be.
Sweet! I've always wanted to see the old pod since I bought this game .23.5

Yes. Please. Can you make the fuselage too?
Do you mean the old fuel tank? If so, then sure. I had already planned on doing that at some point.

There's already a mod that has the tank and other old parts:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/222569-the-original-kerbal-space-program-parts-pack

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/27039-Original-KSP-parts-%28Updated-July-31-2013%29

New favorite part! Thank you for bringing back the memories!

As someone else already pointed out, this is a great Gemini analogue!
This... Is something we needed... Can we haz some Old-alike parts to go with this?
It's been fun using this capsule for playing with twists on previous designs. Thanks for releasing her!

It's been fun using this capsule for playing with twists on previous designs. Thanks for releasing her!

http://i.imgur.com/BrNnHUh.png

http://i.imgur.com/j89t0aP.png

Nice picture, I was having fun with the capsule today. I love the quality of it.

There's already a mod that has the tank and other old parts

There is, but i think he means to redo the old parts so that they still look nostalgic, but are also updated in quality. I for one, want to see his take on it.
I tested the legacy pod and that pack they don't fit together.

I liked the old landing legs the ones that folded down CF-L1 Landing Struts they didnt have suspension it was a sad day when they where removed that old pack hasnt been updated for a while you could always ask to take over the old pack or work with the author to update it

Edited October 7, 2014 by Virtualgenius

Nice, really nice.....

I was hoping that someone would bring her back.......

Please keep it going and the rest of the 'goodies'...

great job.
Needs lights in the IVA.
Any chance we could get it listed on Kerbalstuff please

For what it's worth, I tweaked my own copy of this to fly 2 kerbals instead of one to give it that "Gemini" feel.

Did some flight testing last night and she flies like a dream.

I'm going to have a lot of fun this weekend recreating the Gemini missions in this baby.
Thank you for this cool pod.

I hit a little hiccup with the IVA today. Just after capsule sep for reentry, I noticed that the navballs were out of sync. They appear to be 180 degrees from each other:

This does not happen at any other time in the flight, so it's not a big deal. Just thought you'd like to know.
